Hallelujah, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w lovely|strong="H5273"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*; \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* above \w all|strong="H3605"\w* gods.

Hallelujah!
